name: The Answer Is Yes
description:
A metroidvania made in seven days for Brackey's 2021.1 game jam.

Explore the ruins, escape the monsters, and help a robot discover the meaning of life.

CONTROLS

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

E to interact and progress dialogue

Space to switch characters

CREDITS

All art, coding, and music done by me

SFX done by me, except for these two:

Scream - https://freesound.org/people/nick121087/sounds/333832/

Crash - https://freesound.org/people/CGEffex/sounds/99960/

Palette used - https://lospec.com/palette-list/na16

Character design and story heavily inspired by Geth Jesus
